title: How to Oven Grill a Maple Orange Salmon Fillet on a Natural Oval Cedar Plank

steps.headline: Soak natural oval cedar grilling plank in water for two hours
Lightly coat the plank with olive or vegetable oil
Place salmon fillet skin down on the plank
Cut three thin slices from orange.
steps.description: With a cheese grater, grate rind, and squeeze juice from orange into a bowl

steps.headline: Combine 1/4 cup maple syrup, 1 tablespoon of garlic powder, 2 tablespoons of soy sauce, fresh squeezed orange juice, and grated orange rind to make a glaze.
Cover salmon with glaze and then add orange slices.
Place planked salmon in a cookie sheet and pop into your broiler or toaster oven.
Cook for 5 minutes, then add more glaze.
Cook for another 5-7 minutes and remove from oven.

text: Soak natural oval cedar grilling plank in water for two hours  Lightly coat the plank with olive or vegetable oil  Place salmon fillet skin down on the plank  Cut three thin slices from orange. With a cheese grater, grate rind, and squeeze juice from orange into a bowl Combine 1/4 cup maple syrup, 1 tablespoon of garlic powder, 2 tablespoons of soy sauce, fresh squeezed orange juice, and grated orange rind to make a glaze.  Cover salmon with glaze and then add orange slices.  Place planked salmon in a cookie sheet and pop into your broiler or toaster oven.  Cook for 5 minutes, then add more glaze.  Cook for another 5-7 minutes and remove from oven. Add remainder of glaze Serve on the plank
